text: Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium is a sports stadium in Port Elizabeth, South Africa. It was named after the former South African president Nelson Mandela. == FIFA World Cup == The stadium co-hosted the 2010 FIFA World Cup. It is one of the 10 stadiums where World Cup matches were played. 2010 World Cup Matches All times are given in South African Standard time (UTC+2). title: Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium
